title: Chapter 1338 - 1338 Oh ~~~~ 3
body:
Chapter 1338 - 1338 Oh ~~~~ 3

1338 Oh ~~~~ 3

She quickly dusted her hands and got up. Like a person on a mission, she left quickly without saying a word.

“Is that enough? Are you satisfied now? Can you stop arguing now?” As she retreated back into the broken tower, Lei Xi’er rubbed her red face and couldn’t help but think in her mind.

In the dark, a little loli in a green dress was jumping around with her two ponytails in her hands, smiling so brightly that her eyes were like crescent moons.

“Enough, enough. This is the feeling. I finally got it back. I’ll let you off today!”

“It’s a pity that I can’t do it myself. But this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, so I can only let you take advantage of it.”

“Oh, I’m sleepy again…”

“What ‘I am you, you are me’ nonsense…” Lei Xi ‘er patted her face, quickly cooling down, and then said in a bad mood, “Quickly go to sleep, who cares about this feeling?”

There was finally no more noise in her mind.

Lei Xi’er calmed down, spread out her ten fingers, and silently sized him up.

Their consciousnesses were connected, and so were their emotions. naturally, she could feel the joy of that emotion.

Don’t say.

Xu Xiaoshou was indeed easy to pinch without the thorns.

In the dark, Lei Xi’er’s red lips curled up as she rubbed her fingers and laughed silently.

“Meaty and soft…”

After mumbling, Lei Xi’er sobered up in an instant. It was as if she had been splashed with ice water, and her face once again returned to its cold state.

“No, I can’t stay by Xu Xiaoshou’s side anymore. I’ll be affected by her, and something bad will happen…”

“Hundreds of lives from the Lei family, the Dao clan of the Holy Emperor Aristocratic Families…”

“Also, the demi-saint Dao Xuanji…”

She reached out and pressed her chest, feeling the thumping of her heart. Lei Xi’er looked up in silence.

Looking out from the darkness, the only source of light in the Yuan Mansion was a corner of the window frame.

Clearly, everything had not ended yet.

Mu Zixi can smile because she hasn’t accepted her, Lei Xi’er, and doesn’t understand all the darkness of the past.

“What about me?”

Lei Xi’er clenched her fists, and her God Devil Eyes became extremely heavy. Even this pair of eyes had been given away by her brother in order to save her!

Lei Xi’er pursed her lower lip, her expression was one of struggle and pain.

She knew everything.

How could she still laugh?
